title: Optimizing User Experience and Enhancing Learning Outcomes in LMS-Based Mathematics E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Analysis of learner experiences using mixed research methods (quantitative+qualitative), practice-oriented education on LMS utilization strategies in offline environments

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate learner-friendly designs by analyzing user experience (UX) elements in LMS interfaces
Learners can establish research designs that measure learning outcomes by applying quantitative (survey) and qualitative (interview) data collection methods
Learners can develop LMS utilization strategies suitable for mathematics education content and apply them to project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
